title: Bachelor of Engineering
description: Graduation - started degree in September 2013. Field of study: information technology, with a focus on web applications and system integration.

title: Master of Science in Engineering
description: Graduation - started in September 2017. Field of study: Computer science engineering, with a focus on domain modeling, system architecture, and data security.

title: Software Developer
description: Six months Full-time internship (37.5 hrs/week) as part of B.Eng education.

title: Software Developer
description: Transition to part-time (15 hrs/week) parallel to study activities during B.Eng and MSc.Eng educations.

title: Software Developer
description: Transition to full-time (37.5 hrs/week). Work focused on designing and implementing web-applications and web-services, mainly in the Java and Spring ecosystems.

title: Lead Developer
description: Promotion to a senior developer position. New additional responsibilities (besides normal software engineering actiivities) include such things as technical lead on teams, mentoring and assisting other developers, information gathering and sharing on emerging technologies and paradigms.

title: Security in modern web-applications
description: Work-sponsored certification course showcasing the most common security issues and vulnerabilities in modern web-applications, and leaning how to combat these.
